name: Entitled Puppy Game
description:
Play as a puppy and do puppy things. Not a lot of lore to this one.

See below for hints on the gameplay.

Created with Godot v3.2.2 for the LowrezJam2020. This was my attempt at a casual systemic game. All the programming and pixel art (except the font) were done by me during the jam. The bark sound effect was performed by my corgi, Charlie.

My theme was "hot dog", of course.

Licensed Assets:

"m3x6", a font by Daniel Linssen
https://managore.itch.io/m3x6

"I'm Misbehaving" by Alex McCulloch
https://opengameart.org/content/im-misbehaving

Tips/Hints:

I still had presentation things I didn't get to iron out, so some of the puzzles may be a little cryptic. Here's some tips:

  • It is not mentioned in the game, but arrow keys also work for WASD.
  • Press [Tab] to see your Todo list. You need to complete everything on the list before you can leave the pen.
  • "Click" means the mouse in-game, on the desk. (Be sure the computer is on.)
  • In case you missed the tooltip, you can drag the office chair by holding "Shift".
